{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21542v1", "title": "The intersection of the subgroups of finite $p$-index in a multiple
  HNN-extension of an infinite cyclic group", "summary": "Let $G$ be a multiple HNN-extension of an infinite cyclic group. We will
calculate the intersection $(N_{p}){_\omega}(G)$ of the normal subgroups of
finite $p$-index in $G$ thus generalizing the result of Moldavanskii for
Baumslag-Solitar groups.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-04-30T11:37:19Z"}
